sciduck package

Submodules

sciduck.annotation_table module

sciduck.basic_qc module

sciduck.basic_qc.filter_on_counts_genes(adata: AnnData, min_counts: int = 2000, max_counts: int = 100000, min_genes: int = 1000, max_genes: int = 13000, inplace: bool = False) → AnnData | None

Filter samples based on counts and genes detected. :param adata: Anndata object. :type adata: .h5ad :param min_counts: Minimum counts detected. :type min_counts: int :param max_counts: Maximum counts detected. :type max_counts: int :param min_genes: Minimum genes detected. :type min_genes: int :param max_genes: Maximum genes detected. :type max_genes: int :param inplace: Update the adata object in place or return unmodified object with keeper_cells flagged. :type inplace: bool

Returns:

AnnData | None

sciduck.basic_qc.filter_on_precomputed_metrics(adata: AnnData, doublet_score: float = 0.3, pct_counts_mt: float = 3.0, GEX_Reads_mapped_confidently_to_genome: float = 0.0, GEX_Reads_mapped_to_genome: float = 0.0, GEX_Reads_with_TSO: float = 1.0, inplace: bool = False) → AnnData | None

Filter samples based on precomputed quality control metrics. :param adata: Anndata object. :type adata: .h5ad :param doublet_score: Maximum doublet score. :type doublet_score: float :param pct_counts_mt: Maximum percentage of counts in mitochondrial genes. :type pct_counts_mt: float :param GEX_Reads_mapped_confidently_to_genome: Minimum percentage of confidently mapped reads. There is no pre-defined good practice for threshold, user must specify. :type GEX_Reads_mapped_confidently_to_genome: float :param GEX_Reads_mapped_to_genome: Minimum percentage of reads mapped to genome. There is no pre-defined good practice for threshold, user must specify. :type GEX_Reads_mapped_to_genome: float :param GEX_Reads_with_TSO: Maximum percentage of reads with TSO, per cell. There is no pre-defined good practice for threshold, user must specify. :type GEX_Reads_with_TSO: float :param inplace: Update the adata object in place or return unmodified object with keeper_cells flagged. :type inplace: bool

Returns:

AnnData | None

sciduck.basic_qc.filter_utilizing_coarse_labels(adata: AnnData, coarse_label_column: str, coarse_label_map: dict = {'Neurons': ['Excitatory', 'Inhibitory'], 'Non-Neurons': ['Astrocytes', 'Oligodendrocytes', 'Microglia', 'Endothelial', 'Pericytes']}, coarse_label_threshold: dict = {'Neurons': 2000, 'Non-Neurons': 1000}, inplace: bool = False) → AnnData | None

Filter samples based on coarse labels. :param adata: Anndata object. :type adata: .h5ad :param coarse_label_column: Column name in adata.obs containing coarse labeling identifying neuron and non-neuronal cell types. :type coarse_label_column: str :param coarse_label_map: Coarse cell type labels to define specific filtering on. :type coarse_label_map: dict :param coarse_label_threshold: Minimum genes detected for each coarse label. :type coarse_label_threshold: dict :param inplace: Update the adata object in place or return unmodified object with keeper_cells flagged. :type inplace: bool

Returns:

AnnData | None

sciduck.basic_qc.filter_on_cluster_entropy(adata: AnnData, cluster_column: str, annotation_columns: list, annotation_thresholds: dict) → AnnData | None

Filter samples based on cluster entropy. :param adata: Anndata object. :type adata: .h5ad :param cluster_column: Column name in adata.obs containing cluster labels. :type cluster_column: str :param entropy_columns: Column name in adata.obs containing entropy values. :type entropy_columns: str :param entropy_thresholds: Minimum entropy values for each annotation being considered. :type entropy_thresholds: dict

Returns:

AnnData | None
